main event: Continuous observation of a silver-gray encased object that appeared round and then oblong in shape, moving slowly from east to west with an abrupt disappearance.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes.
No sound was heard from the object.
The object was reported by a radar sighting, indicating it was likely not a balloon despite being described as such.
The object appeared to climb vertically and then descend rapidly.
The sighting was reported by the US Navy and documented in a naval message.
sighted object: silver-gray encased object, round and oblong in shape
